issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify that as a CLIENT user only the data relevant to that client is displayed in the table.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When :
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:

  • When viewing this page as a client user, user should not see the client column and also should be able to see the worker profile related to client logged as only. In this case multiple rows for the same worker will not show.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify basic functionality when logged in as a CLIENT and as a NEUVEN user on the Direct Bank Work page. (Filter/advanced search)

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission

  • OR

  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When:
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:

  • Table to have a universal search option

    • Filters table based on Key word entered

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify basic functionality when logged in as a CLIENT and as a NEUVEN user on the Direct Bank Work page. (Export)

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission
  • OR
  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission
When:
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:
  • The export button will export off of the data displaying on the screen to an excel document.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify Table rule when logged in as a NEUVEN user for a a direct bank worker registered with multiple clients.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission

When:

  • In Direct Bank Workers page


Then:

  • Table can have same worker  shown in multiple rows, showing a row for each client they are registered with

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to client view of worker list page

testCase.name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( general )

testScript.details:
Given : 

  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission

When :

  • Click Documents - View Worker documents

Then
  • Select  and agency from the drop down. 
  • Verify that the following columns have been added to the page. Compliant , Induction Date Column  and ACTION .

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to client view of worker list page

testCase.name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( Compliant )

testScript.details:
Given : 
  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission
When :
  • Click Documents - View Worker documents
Then

  • A green tick is shown if all the mandatory documents based on the job type group for the client and default documents set for Venneu are uploaded by the agency

  •  A red 'x' is shown if one or more mandatory documents are not uploaded or if any of the uploaded mandatory documents have expired

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to client view of worker list page

testCase.name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( Induction Date Column )

testScript.details:
Given : 
  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission
When :
  • Click Documents - View Worker documents
Then
The induction date column

  • Any induction date entered in the shift fulfilment page or in this page is shown in this column

  • This column is visible for users with ‘Approve workers for shift’ permission and only users with this permission can edit the data in this column

  • Date format DD/MM/YYYY

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to client view of worker list page

testCase.name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( Action Column )

testScript.details:
Given : 
  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission
When :
  • Click Documents - View Worker documents
Then :

  • Action column to include an Approval tick box

    • A tick box with blue-tick shows if the worker was previously approved to work for the client in this page or in shift fulfilment page.

    • Empty tick box shown if the worker was not approved previously

    • This tick box is visible only for users with ‘Approve workers for shift’ permission and is also editable only by users with that permission

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add/Edit Bank worker - User Details Tab - Client Drop Down

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the tabs available when creating a new direct bank worker. -User Details Tab

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • Click  ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’
  • Blank profile opens with the following tabs
    • User details
    • Permissions
    • Client locations
    • Financials
    • Compliance
    • Document Upload.
    • Notes
  • On the User Details Tab
    • Add client drop down in the first field
    • This will drop down to show all venue clients
    • User cannot multi-select from this drop down
  • When profile has been saved verify that the client selected appear in the direct bank worker table.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add/Edit Bank worker - User Details Tab - Client Drop Down

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the tabs available when Editing a new direct bank worker. - User Details Tab

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • Click  Edit to change any bank worker details
  • User details tab

  • Client dropdown should be static and client name cannot be changed

  • Confirm that the changes save by saving changes and then going back into the record.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add/Edit Bank worker - User Details Tab - Client Drop Down

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user the tabs available when CREATING / EDITING a new direct bank worker.- User Details Tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client User (Edit Direct Bank worker Permission)

When:

  • Direct Bank Worker page

Then:

  • Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ - 

    • Blank profile opens with different tabs

    • User details tab

    • There is no client dropdown - Instead this client field is automatically defaulted to the Top level parent client of that client user

  • When editing a Direct Bank Worker

    • User details tab

    • any changes made save successfully. 

    • this is tested by making changes and then going back it the record to check the changes.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Compliance Tab - Passport Details section

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the options for EDITING a direct bank workers - compliance tab passport details section

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
  • When editing a Direct Bank Worker 
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Verify that the changes to these field save correctly.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Compliance Tab - Passport Details section

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user the options for EDITING bank workers - compliance tab passport details section

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a CLIENT user (With EDIT Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
  • When editing a Direct Bank Worker 
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Verify that the changes to these field save correctly.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Permissions Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new direct bank worker the default permission on the permissions tab for login via app or website.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:

  • Permissions Tab

    • There will be options for the following logins. 

      • Log in Via Venneu App (Default)

      • Log in Via Venneu Desktop Site

  • When setting up a Direct bank worker ‘Log in Via Venneu App’ permission is ticked by default. 

  • The “Log in via Venneu Desktop Site” is not ticked

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Permissions Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a Client User when creating a new direct bank worker the default permission on the permissions tab for login via app or website.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:

  • Permissions Tab

    • There will be options for the following logins. 

      • Log in Via Venneu App (Default)

      • Log in Via Venneu Desktop Site

  • When setting up a Direct bank worker ‘Log in Via Venneu App’ permission is ticked by default. 

  • The “Log in via Venneu Desktop Site” is not ticked

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - PSNI Details and Access NI

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the PSNI and access NI fields in the compliance tab are available

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab

There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details

These are shown below DBS details

  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)

  • PSNI Expiry date 

    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY

    • Date Picker

  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)

  • Access NI Expiry Date

    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY

    • Date Picker

Rules:

  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - PSNI Details and Access NI

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User the PSNI and access NI fields in the compliance tab are available doesn't save with past expiry dates.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details
These are shown below DBS details
  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)
  • PSNI Expiry date 
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • If there is a expiry date that is in the past then the user should be given an error and it should possibly not allow them to save. 
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)
  • PSNI Expiry date 
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date

  • If there is a expiry date that is in the past then the user should be given an error and it should possibly not allow them to save.

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details
These are shown below DBS details
  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)
  • PSNI Expiry date 
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker

  • Access NI Expiry Date

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - PSNI Details and Access NI

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user The PSNI and Access NI fields can be edited.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab when editing an existing worker the following fields can be edited .
  • PSNI Number 
  • PSNI Expiry date
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - PSNI Details and Access NI

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user The PSNI and Access NI fields can be edited.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab when editing an existing worker the following fields can be edited .
  • PSNI Number 
  • PSNI Expiry date
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Update Compliance Button

testCase.name: Verify the spelling on country of license has been corrected on the page RTW section on the compliance tab for direct bank workers

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

  • OR

  • Client user

When:
  • On direct workers page when adding a new direct worker profile/ editing a direct worker.
Then:
  • The country of license label has had its spelling corrected
  • from country of licence.
  • to county of license.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Update Compliance Button

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User that they can see / use the update compliance button on the Compliance Tab

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab

  • There is a  Compliance Button at  the bottom of page in Compliance tab

  • Saves Details entered or changed within the compliance tab to the worker profile

  • Is to be seen or clickable only by users with above permission

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Update Compliance Button

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User that they can see / use the update compliance button on the Compliance Tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
  • There is a  Compliance Button at  the bottom of page in Compliance tab
  • Saves Details entered or changed within the compliance tab to the worker profile
  • Is to be seen or clickable only by users with above permission

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - DBS details

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User that the DBS details on the Compliance tab appear below the RTW details.

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :
  • One direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker
Then:

  • One the Compliance Tab

    • DBS Details 

      • DBS Certificate Verified Toggle

      • DBS Certificate Verified By (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

      • DBS Certificate Number (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - DBS details

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User that the DBS details on the Compliance tab appear below the RTW details.

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :
  • One direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker
Then:

  • One the Compliance Tab

    • DBS Details 

      • DBS Certificate Verified Toggle

      • DBS Certificate Verified By (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

      • DBS Certificate Number (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - DBS details

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User that the DBS details on the Compliance tab Save and Update when being created / edited.

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :
  • On direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker / editing Bank Worker 
Then:
  • One the Compliance Tab
    • DBS Details 
      • DBS Certificate Verified Toggle
      • DBS Certificate Verified By (Free Type Text field)
      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)
        • Date picker
      • DBS Certificate Number (Free Type Text field)
      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)
        • Date picker
  • When a new bank worker is created all of the above fields save correctly 
  • And when these fields are edited the new details are remembered. 
  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - DBS details

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User that the DBS details on the Compliance tab Save and Update when being created / edited.

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :
  • One direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker / editing Bank Worker 
Then:

  • One the Compliance Tab

    • DBS Details 

      • DBS Certificate Verified Toggle

      • DBS Certificate Verified By (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

      • DBS Certificate Number (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

  • When a new bank worker is created all of the above fields save correctly 

  • And when these fields are edited the new details are remembered. 

  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - DBS details

testCase.name: Verify that as a NEUVEN User that date picker for DBS And Issue date can not be in the future .

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'
When :
  • One direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker / editing Bank Worker 
Then:
  • One the Compliance Tab
    • DBS Details 
      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)
        • Date picker
      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)
        • Date picker
  • When a new bank worker is created it should not allow future dates. 
  • And when these fields are edited the it should not allow future dates. 
  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - DBS details

testCase.name: Verify that as a CLIENT User that date picker for DBS And Issue date can not be in the future .

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When :
  • On direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker / editing Bank Worker 
Then:
  • One the Compliance Tab
    • DBS Details 
      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)
        • Date picker
      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)
        • Date picker
  • When a new bank worker is created it should not allow future dates. 
  • And when these fields are edited the it should not allow future dates. 
  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Work Eligibility Details Section

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User the Work Eligibility Details Section in the Compliance tab in a Direct Bank Workers Profile

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When 

  • On Direct Bank Workers page 

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

 Then :
On the Compliance Tab:

  • Check that there is a section for Work Eligibility Details 
  • Confirm that this is under the Passport Details section. 
  • Confirm that this section includes the following.

    • Work Eligibility Verified (Toggle)

    • Nationality (Text Field)

    • Date of 1st Shift (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

      • Date Picker

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Work Eligibility Details Section

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User the Work Eligibility Details Section in the Compliance tab in a Direct Bank Workers Profile.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When 

  • On Direct Bank Workers page 

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

 Then :
On the Compliance Tab:

  • Check that there is a section for Work Eligibility Details 
  • Confirm that this is under the Passport Details section. 
  • Confirm that this section includes the following.

    • Work Eligibility Verified (Toggle)

    • Nationality (Text Field)

    • Date of 1st Shift (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

      • Date Picker

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Work Eligibility Details Section

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User the Work Eligibility Details Section in the Compliance tab in a Direct Bank Workers Profile saves / edits correctly

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When 

  • On Direct Bank Workers page 

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker / or editing an existing Direct  Bank Worker profile

 Then :
On the Compliance Tab:

  • Check that there is a section for Work Eligibility Details 
  • Confirm that this is under the Passport Details section. 
  • Confirm that this section includes the following.

    • Work Eligibility Verified (Toggle)

    • Nationality (Text Field)

    • Date of 1st Shift (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

      • Date Picker

  • When creating a new bank worker the details entered in this section are saved and can be seen when editing the worker provided the user has relevant permissions to do so. 

  • When these details have been updated they save correctly they are remembered in the profile 

  • If the details are altered when editing and the changes are not saved the original details are remembered in the workers profile. 

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Work Eligibility Details Section

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User the Work Eligibility Details Section in the Compliance tab in a Direct Bank Workers Profile saves / edits correctly.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When 

  • On Direct Bank Workers page 

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker / or editing an existing Direct  Bank Worker profile

 Then :
On the Compliance Tab:

  • Check that there is a section for Work Eligibility Details 
  • Confirm that this is under the Passport Details section. 
  • Confirm that this section includes the following.

    • Work Eligibility Verified (Toggle)

    • Nationality (Text Field)

    • Date of 1st Shift (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

      • Date Picker

  • When creating a new bank worker the details entered in this section are saved and can be seen when editing the worker provided the user has relevant permissions to do so. 

  • When these details have been updated they save correctly they are remembered in the profile 

  • If the details are altered when editing and the changes are not saved the original details are remembered in the workers profile. 

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - View Document Agreement History Button

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user that there is a View Document Agreement History Button on the Direct Bank profile.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When:

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker / edit a Direct Worker Profile

Then: 

  • On the Compliance Tab

  • There is a ‘View Document Agreement History’ Button

  • This Links to the T&C agreed via the APP

  • when this is clicked a Pop up appears  showing  details of the document agreed

  • The heading on the pop up will display :  - User Document Agreement History - ‘'Worker Name’'

  • On the Terms and Conditions popup the is a table at the bottom of the table that shows

    • Version (Show Version Number)

    • Agreement Date (Show date and time of Agreement)

  • Close Button

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - View Document Agreement History Button

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user that there is a View Document Agreement History Button on the Direct Bank profile.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker / edit a Direct Worker Profile

Then: 

  • On the Compliance Tab

  • There is a ‘View Document Agreement History’ Button

  • This Links to the T&C agreed via the APP

  • when this is clicked a Pop up appears  showing  details of the document agreed

  • The heading on the pop up will display :  - User Document Agreement History - ‘'Worker Name’'

  • On the Terms and Conditions popup the is a table at the bottom of the table that shows

    • Version (Show Version Number)

    • Agreement Date (Show date and time of Agreement)

  • Close Button

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Driving Licence Details

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User the driving license details save when creating a new direct bank worker.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab

The page will contain Driving Licence Details ( below PVG)

  • This will consist of the following :

  • Driving Licence Number (Free Type Text Box)

  • Driving Licence Expiry Date (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

    • Date Picker

  • Country of Driving Licence

    • Dropdown to show all countries to pick from

  • Digital Tachograph Card Number (Free type Text Box)

  • Digital Tachograph Card Expiry Date (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

    • Date Picker

  • These details will save when creating a New Direct Bank Worker and a are visible when editing a Direct Bank worker.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Driving Licence Details

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User the driving license details save when creating a new direct bank worker.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab

The page will contain Driving Licence Details ( below PVG)

  • This will consist of the following :

  • Driving Licence Number (Free Type Text Box)

  • Driving Licence Expiry Date (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

    • Date Picker

  • Country of Driving Licence

    • Dropdown to show all countries to pick from

  • Digital Tachograph Card Number (Free type Text Box)

  • Digital Tachograph Card Expiry Date (Helper text with format displayed DD/MM/YYYY)

    • Date Picker

  • These details will save when creating a New Direct Bank Worker and a are visible when editing a Direct Bank worker.

When:

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user the creation and layout of the Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table in the Worker Document Maintenance Page

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven User

When on the: 

  • Document Upload Maintenance Page

  • Direct Bank Worker Document Types Tab

Then:

  • The table displayed show the following columns 

  • Document Type List (Name of the table)

    • Document Name

    • Client

    • Group Job Typed

    • Added on (Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

    • Mandatory

    • Expiry Applicable

    • Edit Button

    • Save and Cancel Buttons

    • Delete Button

    • Search function

    • Pagination

    • Drop down to display number of entries

    • Each column sortable

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user the client drop down function works on the Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table in the Worker Document Maintenance Page

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven User

When on the: 

  • Document Upload Maintenance Page

  • Direct Bank Worker Document Types Tab

Then:

  • The table displayed show the following columns 

  • The Initial load of the page will show documents for all clients.

  • There will be a filter on the to select a specific client using a dropdown function. 

  • When a specific client is selected only the information relevant to that client will show.

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user that details can be EDITED on the Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table in the Worker Document Maintenance Page

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven User

When on the: 

  • Document Upload Maintenance Page

  • Direct Bank Worker Document Types Tab

Then:
  • On the table there is an Edit Button
  • When clicked, a pop up box to display 
  • Only Fields Mandatory or Expiry Applicable can be edited
  • There are Save and Cancel Buttons

    • Once Save clicked, the details are to
      be updated in the Document List

    • Once Cancel clicked, no changes are
      to be saved

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user that details can be DELETED on the Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table in the Worker Document Maintenance Page.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven User

When on the: 

  • Document Upload Maintenance Page

  • Direct Bank Worker Document Types Tab

Then:
  • On the table there is a Delete Button
  • When clicked popup window to say 'are you
    sure you want to delete the document from
    the list?' with Yes and No Buttons

    • Yes selected -row deleted

    • No – No changes made

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Direct Bank worker Document Tab - Table

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user that the mandatory and expiry applicable fields display correct information on the Direct Bank worker Document Tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven User

When on the: 

  • Document Upload Maintenance Page

  • Direct Bank Worker Document Types Tab

Then:

  • Mandatory

    • Yes or no displayed based on whether tick
      box was ticked or not while adding the
      document name

  • Expiry Applicable

    • Yes or no displayed based on the tick box when adding

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Add Direct Bank worker Document tab-Add functionality

testCase.name: Verify changes to Direct Bank Worker Documents Types tab as a NEUVEN user

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user

When :

  • Administration

  • Worker Document Maintenance page

  • Direct Bank Worker Documents Types tab

Then:

  • There is a Client Dropdown

    • Show all Venneu Clients

    • No Multi-select option

  • There is  Group drop down to be included on the page

    • Drop down to be populated with the job type group name from group column in client Job types page

    • No multi select option for the group drop down

    • All group as an option

  • There is a Document Type Dropdown

    • This drop down is fed from the Document Type Name Maintenance page, here the document names will be added and then the Document Name drop down in this page, will be populated with these names

    • The Document Name’s will be all document names irrespective that have had the default box ticked or not on the Document Type Name Maintenance Page

  • There is an Add Mandatory Upload Tick box

  • There is an Expiry Applicable Tick box

  • Add Document type Button

issue.summary: Worker Document Maintenance Page - Add Direct Bank worker Document tab-Add functionality

testCase.name: Verify the creation of Direct Bank Worker Documents Types tab as a NEUVEN user.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user

When :

  • Administration

  • Worker Document Maintenance page

  • Direct Bank Worker Documents Types tab

Then:

  • There is a Client Dropdown

    • Show all Venneu Clients

    • No Multi-select option

  • There is  Group drop down to be included on the page

    • Drop down to be populated with the job type group name from group column in client Job types page

    • No multi select option for the group drop down

    • All group as an option

  • There is a Document Type Dropdown

    • This drop down is fed from the Document Type Name Maintenance page, here the document names will be added and then the Document Name drop down in this page, will be populated with these names

    • The Document Name’s will be all document names irrespective that have had the default box ticked or not on the Document Type Name Maintenance Page

  • There is an Add Mandatory Upload Tick box

  • There is an Expiry Applicable Tick box

  • Add Document type Button

    • When the Add Document type Button if clicked the  documents are added to the table .

      • Entries cannot be duplicated

      • Cannot have duplicates, e.g can’t have the same client, group and document type combination

      • Error message to be displayed if the Client, group and document combination already exist in the document table

testCase.name: As a NUEVENUSER User ...

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user

When :

  • Administration

  • Worker Document Maintenance page

  • Direct Bank Worker Documents Types tab

Then:

  • There is a Client Dropdown

    • Show all Venneu Clients

    • No Multi-select option

  • There is  Group drop down to be included on the page

    • Drop down to be populated with the job type group name from group column in client Job types page

    • No multi select option for the group drop down

    • All group as an option

  • There is a Document Type Dropdown

    • This drop down is fed from the Document Type Name Maintenance page, here the document names will be added and then the Document Name drop down in this page, will be populated with these names

    • The Document Name’s will be all document names irrespective that have had the default box ticked or not on the Document Type Name Maintenance Page

  • There is an Add Mandatory Upload Tick box

  • There is an Expiry Applicable Tick box

  • Add Document type Button

    • When the Add Document type Button if clicked the  documents are added to the table .

      • Entries cannot be duplicated

      • Cannot have duplicates, e.g can’t have the same client, group and document type combination

      • Error message to be displayed if the Client, group and document combination already exist in the document table

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Compliance Tab - Passport Details section

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the options for CREATING a direct bank workers - compliance tab passport details section.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Financials Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User Details save when creating an new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

  • Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button

  • Create New Direct Bank Worker

Then:

  • On the Financials tab

    • Display info icon with message ' Please make sure your bank details are complete and match the name of your bank account, as any errors may lead to your invoices not being paid or paid into the incorrect bank account.'

    • The following fields  are on this tab. 

    • Account Name field

    • Account Number field

    • Sort code Field

    • Tick box (I confirm I have entered bank details from a personal account not a limited company)

    • National Insurance Number / PPS Number field

    • UTR Number

    • VAT Number

    • Payroll Reference

    • Pension Opt in /out (Radio Box)

    • Select employment status dropdown

      • PAYE

      • LTD

      • SOLE TRADER

      • Other

    • Worker employment status other field

      • If ‘other’ selected in employment status dropdown

      • Enable typing into this field

    • Umbrella company dropdown

      • Yes 

      • No

    • Umbrella Company Name dropdown

    • Umbrella Company Name other 

      • Free type text box

      • Show helper text

      • Text box enabled when ‘other’ selected in Umbrella Company Name dropdown.

  •  All Details entered in this tab  and saved will be stored against the Bank workers profile for the Client.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Financials Tab

When:

  • Create New Direct Bank Worker

Then:

  • On the Financials tab

    • Display info icon with message ' Please make sure your bank details are complete and match the name of your bank account, as any errors may lead to your invoices not being paid or paid into the incorrect bank account.'

    • The following fields  are on this tab. 

    • Account Name field

    • Account Number field

    • Sort code Field

    • Tick box (I confirm I have entered bank details from a personal account not a limited company)

    • National Insurance Number / PPS Number field

    • UTR Number

    • VAT Number

    • Payroll Reference

    • Pension Opt in /out (Radio Box)

    • Select employment status dropdown

      • PAYE

      • LTD

      • SOLE TRADER

      • Other

    • Worker employment status other field

      • If ‘other’ selected in employment status dropdown

      • Enable typing into this field

    • Umbrella company dropdown

      • Yes 

      • No

    • Umbrella Company Name dropdown

    • Umbrella Company Name other 

      • Free type text box

      • Show helper text

      • Text box enabled when ‘other’ selected in Umbrella Company Name dropdown.

  •  All Details entered in this tab  and saved will be stored against the Bank workers profile for the Client.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Financials Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User Details save when EDITING a new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

    • On Direct Bank Workers Page
    • Edit an existing Direct Bank Worker
  • Then:
    • On the Financials tab
      • Verify that changes made to this information in this tab save correctly.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank workers - Financials Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User Details save when EDITING a new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab

testScript.details:
Given:

When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

  • Edit an existing Direct Bank Worker

Then:

  • On the Financials tab

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add bank workers - Compliance Tab - Right to Work Details

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN User RWT when creating a new Direct Bank Worker - Compliance Tab

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :
  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker
Then :

  • On the Compliance Tab 

    • The right to work details will be show below Right to Work Details   Work Eligibility

      • there will be a Toggle to show if Right to Work Accepted

      • Select Document Type -Dropdown -Options

        • British Passport

        • EU Passport

        • Other

      • If 'OTHER' is selected the following will appear if Other is NOT SELCTED THE FOLLWOING WILL BE GRAYED OUT. reRIGHT TO WORK 

      • Provide Other RTW detail

      • RTW Reference Number

      • Date of Initial RTW Check

      • RTW Expiry Date

      • Settled Status - Dropdown - Options

        • UK Passport

        • Settled - Non UK Passport

        • Settled - UK Citizen - No Passport

        • Pre-Settled - Non UK Passport

      • Pre - Settled Start Date

        • Active only with ‘Pre - Settled’ is selected for ‘Settled Status’ otherwise greyed out

      • Pre - Settled Expiry Date

        • Active only with ‘Pre - Settled’ is selected for ‘Settled Status’ otherwise greyed out

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.

        • Active only with ‘Pre - Settled’ is selected for ‘Settled Status’ otherwise greyed out

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT User RWT when EDITING a new Direct Bank Worker - Compliance Tab

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :
    • Editing an existing Direct Banker worker. 
  • Then :
    • On the Compliance Tab 
      • The right to work details will be show below Right to Work Details   Work Eligibility
        • there will be a Toggle to show if Right to Work Accepted
        • Select Document Type -Dropdown -Options
          • British Passport

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Check DBS Number Button

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user that the DBS function pulls information correctly from the API.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fieilds

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Forename (Null)

    • Status (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • Status of User is returned and all the fields are filled
    This screen then closes and the user can then close the main popup screen

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Check DBS Number Button

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user that the DBS function gives an appropriate error when pulling incorrect or has miss matched date in the DBS API.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fields

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Forename (Null)

    • Status (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • When the DBS service check returns  ‘No Match Found’ we need an alert to highlight to the person performing the action the reason for this. For example;

    • Incorrect DBS number 
    • User is not registered on the DBS update service
    • Incorrect first name or surname

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Check DBS Number Button

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fieilds

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Forename (Null)

    • Status (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • Status of User is returned and all the fields are filled
    This screen then closes and the user can then close the main popup screen

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Bank Workers - Compliance Tab - Check DBS Number Button

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user that the DBS function gives an appropriate error when pulling incorrect or has miss matched date in the DBS API.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fields

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Forename (Null)

    • Status (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • When the DBS service check returns  ‘No Match Found’ we need an alert to highlight to the person performing the action the reason for this. For example;

    • Incorrect DBS number 
    • User is not registered on the DBS update service
    • Incorrect first name or surname

issue.summary: Neuven User - Manage Reports - User Specific Reports

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the creation and function of the user tab in the manage report page.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with manage reports permission. 
When :
  • On the report management page. 
Then :
  • Verify that there is a user tab on reports for both Neuven and client user reports that will allow each report to become user specific , meaning that only specific users for that client have aces to view/ run the report.

issue.summary: Neuven/Client User - Reports - User Specific Reports

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user with specific permissions to view a report that there are no error when viewing the report it question.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client 
When:
  • The client user is active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The client has access to that report and can run it without any issue.

issue.summary: Neuven/Client User - Reports - User Specific Reports

testCase.name: Verify as a Neuven user with specific permissions to view a report that there are no error when viewing the report it question.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven user 
When:
  • The client user is active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The client has access to that report and can run it without any issue.

issue.summary: Neuven/Client User - Reports - User Specific Reports

testCase.name: Verify that User can only view report that are match their user type.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • reports being restrict to either a neuven or a client report 
When :
  • Logged in as a client or a neuven user
Then :
  • When logging in as a specific user type with report permission verify that i can only see the relevant reports.

issue.summary: Neuven/Client User - Reports - User Specific Reports

testCase.name: Verify that a CLIENT User Who doesn't have permission to view a report cant see the report.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client 
When:
  • The client user is no active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The client does not have the report showing as an option on the reports page and cant access it.

issue.summary: Neuven/Client User - Reports - User Specific Reports

testCase.name: Verify that a Neuven User Who doesn't have permission to view a report cant see the report.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven user 
When:
  • The Neuven user is no active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The Neuven does not have the report showing as an option on the reports page and cant access it.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 1. Verify that the daily (Nightly) Check DBS Number API runs against all APPROVED bank workers.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run.
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • It only returns data relevant to approved bank workers.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 2. Verify that the daily (Nightly) Check DBS Number API Does not run against UNAPPROVED bank workers.

testScript.details:
Given – 
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  •  It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • It doesn’t show any new data against workers who have been unapproved.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 3. Verify that the API only pickup records with NEW_INFO.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • It only picks up data with changes (NEW_INFO)

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 4. Verify the email with this information is sent to CLIENT USERS that are linked to the relevant LOCATION and have the Edit Direct Bank worker permission.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • If a client user has the edit direct back works permission flagged in their profile and   is in the same location and the direct bank worker. Then they will receive data about the direct bank worker.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 5. Verify that other client users in the same location without the Edit Direct Bank worker permission dont receive and email.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • If a client user does not have edit direct back works permission flagged in their profile and   is in the same location and the direct bank worker. Then they will receive data about the direct bank worker.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 6. Verify that other client users in the different location without the Edit Direct Bank worker permission dont receive and email.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • If a client user does not have edit direct back works permission flagged in their profile and   is in a different location and the direct bank worker. Then they will not receive data about the direct bank worker.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 7. Verify that the email body contains the name of the client user who has the correct permissions.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When – 
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then – 
  • The body of the email will contain the following text: 
    • Hello (Name of Client User)
    • Attached is table of Bank workers whose DBS check has returned “NEW_INFO”.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 8. Verify that the email contains an email attachment with the following columns first / last name, DBS number and status.

testScript.details:
Given – 
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When – 
  • It checked the DBS numbers.
Then -
  • The email that has been sent to the client user with relevant permission can see and excel document with the following columns in it. 
    • First Name (Show First Name)
    • Last Name (Show Last Name)
    • DBS Number (Show DBS Number)
    • Status ( “NEW_INFO”)

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 9. Verify that the data in the spreadsheet is attached if relevant and for the location or the person receiving it.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Overnight DBS check functionality

testCase.name: 10. Verify that the email contains an email attachment with the following columns first / last name, DBS number and status.

testScript.details:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then -
  • The email that has been sent to the client user with relevant permission can see and excel document with the following columns in it. 
    • First Name (Show First Name)
    • Last Name (Show Last Name)
    • DBS Number (Show DBS Number)
    • Status ( “NEW_INFO”)
  • All of the above information relates to workers in the same location of the person receiving the email.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven User - Client Set-Up page

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user there are Radio buttons for worker type when ADDING a client

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven User 
When :
  • Adding a Client User 
Then :
  • On the addition information tab
  • There should be three radio buttons called 
    • Agency workers only
    • Direct bank worker only 
    • Both 
  • Verify that the selected option saves correctly to the client profile

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven User - Client Set-Up page

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user there are Radio buttons for worker type when EDITING a client

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven User 
When :
  • Editing a Client User 
Then :
  • On the addition information tab
  • There should be three radio buttons called 
    • Agency workers only
    • Direct bank worker only 
    • Both 
  • Verify that the selected option saves correctly to the client profile

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven User - Client Set-Up page

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven User 
When :
  • Adding a Client Location
Then :  
  • On the addition information tab
  • There should be three radio buttons called 
    • Agency workers only
    • Direct bank worker only 
    • Both 
  • Verify that the selected option saves correctly to the client profile

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven User - Client Set-Up page

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user there are Radio buttons for worker type when EDITING a client location

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven User 
When :
  • Editing a Client Location
Then :  
  • On the addition information tab
  • There should be three radio buttons called

    • Direct bank worker only

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven User - Client Set-Up page

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user Worker type on child profile as copied by from the parent by default

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven User 
When :
  • Adding a Client Location OR and a Client
Then :
  • The worker type should be set as the parent as a default, but this is able to be saved / edited independent of the parent.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven User - Client Set-Up page

testCase.name: Verify that as a NEUVEN the worker type is a compulsory field

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven User 
When :
  • Adding a Client Location OR and a Client
Then :
  • The profile can’t be saved unless the worker type has been selected. 

This is copied if this is copied from the parent then this does need to be run as it doesn't make sense.
